thread.title: Rosemary Barnes Robertson
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Rosemary Barnes Robertson

author: Rosemary Barnes Robertson
title: Rosemary Barnes Robertson
text: My daughter tried on a dress in a local store that she absolutely loved but she needed a different size and the store said they could not get it. I checked out many online sites and decided this was reputable. They said they could ship the dress on March 3rd and to my surprise it was on my door step yesterday February 22nd . We are so pleased we got the dress she had her heart set on. Thank you for exceeding my expectations.
